title: Charlie Crist hones message a year into campaign trail for Florida governor

author: Ronn Blitzer
title: DeSantis signs bill designating statewide Victims of Communism Day
DeSantis mandates lessons on communism for high school students

sentence: pic.twitter.com/Ojlao8f46t Ron DeSantis (@GovRonDeSantis) May 9, 2022 I appreciate this initiative and the fact that we are honoring the victims of communism by teaching young people about the evils of communism and the moral obligation we have to stop it,? Cuban human rights activist Rosa Mara Pay said in response to the legislation, according to the press release.
author: WND News Services
title: Now Florida to teach students 'evils of communism'

sentence: Governor Ron DeSantis on Monday signed legislation to create a Victims of Communism Day? each year on November 7, at which time public school teachers will be required to spend at least 45 minutes teaching students about communist leaders and how people suffered under their regimes.
author: Brittany Bernstein
title: DeSantis Signs Bill Requiring Education on Communist Regimes in Public Schools
